Dialogue.Page: [There's no mistaking it, this is the source of the museum's plate! It's been torn off the hull at some point, but this is defitely the same metal and paint.]
[Judging by the structure, this is some kind of escape pod. It seems to be in a good shape, so the inhabitant(s) of it likely survived entry.]
[Perhaps, one day, you can discover what happened to the survivors? It would have been very long ago, but, there's gotta be a chance.]
[Congrats! You have completed the Jam version of Hearth's Neighbor (unless you managed find this early)! We wanted more after this, but time constraints required us to cut the ending short.]
[Perhaps one day, we'll actually give this mod a full overhaul, with a proper ending, but no promises.]

[What, you want more? All right. Go back to where you learned about this pod, and look for a hidden tunnel. You can enter one side, but it's blocked. However, it goes all the way through to the other side...see if you can figure out where it ends up.]
